snippet.title: Ludo Okpo
snippet.description:
*THIS IS THE OFFICIAL LUDO OKPO GAME

Ludo, a game renowned for centuries, is back and ready to play.

Ludo game is a fun multiplayer strategy board game that can be played between two, three, or four players.

This is the mobile version of the board game and is perfect for playing with friends and family. Ludo is also known as Parchisi, Pachisi, parcheesi or Parchisi #game . The magic dice game of ludo relies on luck.

Fresh Game Themes are available:
Forest Theme
Cricket Theme
Bollywood Theme
Candy Chocolate Crush Theme
Christmas Theme
Puzzle Game Theme
Battleground Theme
Diwali Theme
Fantasy Theme
Color Theme

Roll the dice and become a ludo star. You played the ludo game at home in your childhood and now it can be accessed on your phone and tablet. Ludo Oking

Recall your childhood memories and bring nostalgia to the table in this easy to start game with consistent updates and the latest themes added regularly. Ok ludo

Ludo Okpo is a classic board game which has also been known as Ludu, Lodo, Chopat, Chaupur, Pachis. Ludo can be played online or offline with your friends or by yourself. Fun लूडो casual game a bit of luck. Ludo Ok

Parcheesi is popular in many countries and has different names in different regions like Mensch ärgere Dich nicht, Cờ cá ngựa, Uckers, Le Jeu de Dada (The Game of Dada), Non t'arrabbiare, Fia med knuff (Fia with push), Fei Xing Qi', Griniaris, Petits Chevaux (Little Horses), Ki nevet a végén, برسي (Barjis/Barjees).

Ludo is also often written as Loodo, Chakka, Luddo, Lido, Lado, Ledo, Leedo, Laado, luudo. Very easy to play लूडो गेम. Made in India.

Ludo is a popular game that is played in many countries across the world, including but not limited to:

#india 
Pakistan
Bangladesh
Nepal
Afghanistan
Sri Lanka
Saudi Arabia
United Arab Emirates
Egypt
United Kingdom
United States
Australia
Canada
Brazil
#indonesia 
Germany
Mexico
Argentina
Chile
Peru
Spain
Thailand
Vietnam
South Africa
Nigeria

Play #ludo  and become king - Follow us to get news and updates:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ludookpogames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ludookpo
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ludookpogames
